data.name: Super Mega Zero Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Written and produced by DDRKirby(ISQ), featuring A-zu-ra

-Tracklist-

1) Super Mega Zero
2) Cyclic Oscillations
3) Pursuit of Infinity
4) Flow Unlimited
5) Irrational Space
6) One more Try
7) Tritonal Tribulations
8) Null Terminator
9) Fortitude
10) Infinity
11) Midnight Marauder
12) Eject (Written and produced by A-zu-ra & DDRKirby(ISQ))
13) Unbounded Limit
14) Sequential Success

data.short_description: Dust off your cassette player and listen to the amazing chiptune soundtrack of Super Mega Zero, written and produced by DDRKirby(ISQ), featuring A-zu-ra.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 500 MB available space
